units.title: Assessing regulon activity dependence on morphogen concentration
units.text: We then examined the dependency of regulon activity on morphogen concentration culture settings used dual SMAD inhibition for neural induction.

units.title: Measuring aggregation discrepancy (MMD) as predictor of organoid composition
units.text: We then measured maximum mean and noted that, in MNIM without morphogens, the date of aggregation discrepancy (MMD) values between conditions with FGF8 and their was the main factor correlating with changes in organoid composition

units.title: RSS‑UMAP projection to compare cell lines under morphogen treatment
